Teams

Get a team details

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

teams

/

{team\_id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/teams/{team_id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "name": "<string>",
  "description": "<string>",
  "allow_auto_assign": true,
  "account_id": 123,
  "is_member": true
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#parameter-team-id)

team\_id

integer

required

The ID of the team to be updated

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-id)

id

number

The ID of the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-name)

name

string

The name of the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-description)

description

string

The description about the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-allow-auto-assign)

allow\_auto\_assign

boolean

If this setting is turned on, the system would automatically assign the conversation to an agent in the team while assigning the conversation to a team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

The ID of the account with the team is a part of

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/get-a-team-details#response-is-member)

is\_member

boolean

This field shows whether the current user is a part of the team
